page.title: 04CHURCHES IN BOW
page.content: In our area we have three churches.A congregational church,a gospel hall, St Bartholomews which is Church of England.{1.ST BARTHOLOMEWS}is in Nymet Tracey dating from 11th century. There is an unusual 15th century screen, carved and painted,which was recently restored. The church is one and half miles from Bow.There is a bus from Bow on Sundays to get to the church. {2.CONGREGATIONAL}The church was built in 1899.It seats 150 approximately.The Deacon of the church in 1985 is Mr.F.Milton.It stands next to the school and is opposite to the village hall.The church has no minister but they have a visiting minister. {3.GOSPEL HALL}It was originally a day school with provision for Sunday Worship.Now it is run by David Hayman.
